attributes.action: Get Sky Sports to Allow Pay Per View Football Rather Than monthly fee
attributes.additional_details:
Times are hard and everyone is feeling the pinch, If you are a football Fan you might not want the whole sports package, why pay sky sports around £20 p/m for sky sports when your team might only be on 1-2 a season, if you’re lucky.

A fairer option would be Pay per View matches, charging between £3-£5 per game maybe? Not only would this allow more people a chance to watch their team, I believe more people would be willing to pay this than £20 p/m so Sky wouldn’t be out of pocket. Everybody Wins.

Sign the petition if you agree - Hopefully we can get Sky to sort it out and stop televised football being priced out for most people.
